text: (dramatic music)

- Pearson is the world's
leading learning company.

We had a very large ERP
implementation at Pearson

and part of that movement
to front data center,

to the cloud, is we had a
very prevalent NAS requirement

through both the web
tiers and the app tiers.

When Amazon FSX for NetApp
ONTAP was made available to us,

we were able to replace
those implementations.

FSX for ONTAP gives us all
the NetApp capabilities
fully managed by AWS.
So we were able to take advantage

of all the things that
NetApp ONTAP provides.

All these capabilities allow
us to easily move workloads
from the data center to the cloud

without having to redesign the
entire storage architecture.

We were able to see a
three-times improvement

of our application jobs, and
also a 10-times improvement
of our data refreshes and data cloning.
We were able to not have to focus

on the specifics of the
operational overhead
of running a NetApp service at scale,

we're able to put more attention
on the actual application

and the user journeys and the
real value that's being added
for our customers.
(music concludes)
